Letter labels intellectually disabled who distrust IHC as ‘serial complainants’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letter-labels-intellectually-disabled-who-distrust-ihc-serial-complainants/ZK775CCDZRA5XFJHYTOJIVKLIM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letter-labels-intellectually-disabled-who-distrust-ihc-serial-complainants/ZK775CCDZRA5XFJHYTOJIVKLIM/ Natalie AkoorieShelley Payne wrote a scathing open letter defending IHC/IDEA Services, slating Whaikaha. Wed, 06 Dec 2023 16:00:00 +0000 IHC/IDEA Services published a scathing open letter on its website by a former board member defending the organisation after a damning review of its complaints policy. The review was also critical of Whaikaha, the Ministry of Disabled People. Photo / NZME

Wed, 06 Dec 2023 16:00:00 +0000 A man was being given CPR on the side of the road when a thief is believed to have struck. Stock photo / 123rf
Woven Earth charity gets Christmas grant from Auckland Airport to provide furniture to needy families https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/writing-earth-charity-gets-christmas-grant-from-auckland-airport-to-provide-furniture-to-needy-families/ZXO2QR7VIZGCXDGDVH43WS5VOA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/writing-earth-charity-gets-christmas-grant-from-auckland-airport-to-provide-furniture-to-needy-families/ZXO2QR7VIZGCXDGDVH43WS5VOA/ Woven Earth charity gets Christmas grant from Auckland Airport. Wed, 06 Dec 2023 16:00:00 +0000 Clare Lowrie and Rachael McGregor are part of a team of volunteers from Woven Earth who loaded household goods into a new home for a family affected by violence before the new tenants arrive from temporary care. They used grant money from Auckland Airport to buy new beds and appliances for the mother and children. Photo / Greg Bowker

Letters: We need to teach students how to think, not just get right answers; airport woes; and council spending https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letters-we-need-to-teach-students-how-to-think-not-just-get-right-answers-airport-woes-and-council-支出/SMYC3QM2YJDRTCXMFFMJDMT5Z4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letters-we-need-to-teach-students-how-to-think-not-just-get-right-answers-airport-woes-and-council-支出/SMYC3QM2YJDRTCXMFFMJDMT5Z4/ Opinion: 'The ability to critically think for yourself has never been more important.'
